prompts.name: Voix-off Corporate
prompts.prompt: Generate a professional corporate voiceover. Voice characteristics: [gender], [age range], [accent]. Tone: confident, authoritative yet approachable. Pace: moderate, clear articulation. Style: business presentation, suitable for company videos.

prompts.name: Voix-off Documentaire
prompts.prompt: Create a documentary-style narration voice. Voice: [gender], mature, authoritative. Tone: informative, engaging, slightly dramatic. Pace: measured with strategic pauses. Style: nature documentary or historical narrative.

prompts.name: Voix-off E-learning
prompts.prompt: Generate an e-learning narration voice. Voice: [gender], friendly, patient. Tone: educational, encouraging, clear. Pace: slightly slower than conversational, with emphasis on key terms. Style: online course instructor.

prompts.name: Spot Radio Énergique
prompts.prompt: Create an energetic radio ad voice. Voice: [gender], young adult. Tone: enthusiastic, exciting, urgent. Pace: fast but clear. Style: promotional, call-to-action focused. Energy level: high.

prompts.name: Publicité Luxe
prompts.prompt: Generate a luxury brand advertisement voice. Voice: [gender], sophisticated. Tone: elegant, refined, aspirational. Pace: slow, deliberate. Style: high-end brand, whisper-like quality optional.

prompts.name: Promo Réseaux Sociaux
prompts.prompt: Create a social media promo voice. Voice: [gender], young, relatable. Tone: casual, friendly, authentic. Pace: conversational, natural. Style: influencer-like, Gen-Z appeal.

personnages_narration.description: Prompts pour personnages et narration créative

prompts.name: Personnage Jeu Vidéo
prompts.prompt: Create a video game character voice. Character type: [character type]. Voice: [gender], [age]. Personality: [personality traits]. Accent: [accent if any]. Emotion range: from calm to intense.

prompts.name: Narrateur Audiobook
prompts.prompt: Generate an audiobook narrator voice. Genre: [genre]. Voice: [gender], expressive. Tone: engaging, emotionally varied. Pace: adaptable to content. Style: professional audiobook quality, character differentiation ability.

prompts.name: Assistant Virtuel
prompts.prompt: Create a virtual assistant voice. Voice: [gender], neutral age. Tone: helpful, friendly, professional. Pace: clear, moderate. Style: AI assistant, Siri/Alexa-like but unique.

musique_effets_sonores.description: Prompts pour musique et effets sonores IA

prompts.name: Musique de Fond Corporate
prompts.prompt: Generate corporate background music. Style: modern, uplifting. Tempo: [BPM] BPM. Mood: professional, optimistic. Instruments: soft synths, light percussion, subtle piano. Duration: [duration] seconds. Use: presentation, corporate video.

prompts.name: Jingle Publicitaire
prompts.prompt: Create an advertising jingle. Style: [genre]. Tempo: catchy, memorable. Mood: [mood]. Duration: [duration] seconds. Requirements: hook in first 3 seconds, brand-friendly, royalty-free.

prompts.name: Ambiance Podcast
prompts.prompt: Generate podcast intro/outro music. Style: [podcast genre] appropriate. Tempo: moderate. Mood: welcoming, professional. Duration: 15-30 seconds. Features: clear beginning and end, loop-friendly middle section.

prompts.name: Effets Sonores Jeu
prompts.prompt: Create game sound effects. Type: [effect type]. Style: [game genre]. Quality: high-definition, clean. Variations: 3-5 variations of the same effect. Format: ready for game engine integration.

clonage_vocal.description: Prompts pour clonage et personnalisation vocale

prompts.name: Clone Voix Standard
prompts.prompt: Clone voice from provided sample. Maintain: original tone, accent, speech patterns. Optimize for: [use case]. Quality settings: high fidelity, natural prosody. Output: ready for [application type].
prompts.requirements: Audio sample of 1-3 minutes, clear quality

prompts.name: Adaptation Multilingue
prompts.prompt: Adapt cloned voice for [target language]. Maintain: original voice characteristics. Adjust: pronunciation, intonation for target language. Quality: native-speaker natural.

stability.description: Contrôle la cohérence de la voix

general: Toujours spécifier le genre et l'âge de la voix
Inclure le contexte d'utilisation pour de meilleurs résultats
Tester plusieurs variations avant de finaliser
Ajuster les paramètres de stabilité selon le besoin
quality: Utiliser des échantillons audio de haute qualité pour le clonage
Éviter les bruits de fond dans les échantillons
Préférer des enregistrements de 2-3 minutes minimum
commercial_use: ElevenLabs offre des licences commerciales claires
Vérifier les droits pour le clonage vocal
Obtenir le consentement pour cloner des voix réelles
Les voix synthétiques standard sont généralement libres de droits
